Vase shape when closed. Color photograph, wide angle of a garden park in the south on a body of water, with four women in colorful ball gowns promenading on a walk and across a footbridge. J.W. Hallowell & Sons, Inc., (Chevrolet, Oldsmobile), Federalsburg, Maryland.
